sentences.sContent: A challenge is simply an opportunity in disguise.
sentences.sCn: 一次挑战也就是一个被伪装的机会。

sentences.sContent: He is in disguise so none of his enemies will recognize him.
sentences.sCn: 他做了些伪装因此他的敌人谁都没有认出他来。

sentences.sContent: You can turn unemployment into a blessing in disguise – if you have the right mindset.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有一个良好的心态，你可以把失业转换成一种经过伪装的好事。
